summary: Create an online store website named "Luxury Bazar" with category sections (Home, Women, Men, Watches, Gym, and others) and add a dashboard area.
architectural_notes: Set the website/store name (brand) to "Luxury Bazar" and display it in the UI (e.g., header/logo area and relevant page titles).

existing_features.title: Create a storefront navigation structure with top-level sections/pages: Home, Women, Men, Watches, Gym, and Other, accessible via a persistent header navigation on all pages.
Implement a coherent storefront UI theme (colors, typography, spacing, buttons, cards) and apply it consistently across all pages; avoid blue/purple as primary brand colors.
Add category landing page layouts for Women, Men, Watches, Gym, and Other with a hero area and a responsive product grid/list section.
Create a product detail view that opens when selecting a product from any category and shows product image, name, price, description, and category.
Implement a simple shopping cart in the frontend (add to cart, update quantity, remove item, view cart summary) stored in client state for the current session.
Wire the frontend to the backend product catalog using React Query for data fetching and caching, including loading and error UI states on category and product pages.
Add a Home page that highlights the main store sections with prominent links/cards to Women, Men, Watches, Gym, and Other, plus a featured products area fed by the same product catalog.
Add generated static brand assets (logo + category hero banners) to the frontend as static files and use them in the UI (header logo and category hero areas).
Add a new Dashboard page to the storefront at route "/dashboard" that displays a simple admin-style overview of the catalog using existing backend product data.
Update the persistent header navigation to include a visible link labeled "Dashboard" that routes to "/dashboard" on both desktop and mobile navigation variants.
Update the storefront branding to display the site name "Luxury Bazar" in the persistent header (next to the existing logo image) on all pages.
Update the HTML document title to "Luxury Bazar" so the browser tab displays the correct site name.
Update footer copyright text to include the site name "Luxury Bazar".

new_feature_requests.summary: Add main site sections/pages: Home, Women, Men, Watches, Gym, and Other categories
Implement a minimal backend product catalog API with seeded products across categories (Women, Men, Watches, Gym, Other) and expose query methods for the frontend to fetch categories and products.
Add a dashboard section/page (admin-style area) to the online store website
